text: Sturgills is an unincorporated community in the Helton Township of Ashe County, North Carolina near the border with the state of Virginia. ==History== Sturgills was named for a former Sheriff B. Sturgills who was instrumental in the founding of the community's former post office . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Ashe County, North Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in North Carolina
title: Sturgills, North Carolina
